title: Research under Professors CSE
content: What's the procedure to do research under a professor? And is it a good idea to do research in 4th sem(CSE)?

comments.body: Doing research is good thing. Firstly identify your field of interest, then see if you require some pre requisite skills. Reach out to professors on text, email or orally and speak to them about what you wanna do, make sure that the professor is from you field of interest. Listen to what they have to say and plan accordingly
